subject: Add inline markdown support to structured text fields
body:
Structured text elements (Title, Tagline, Body, CTA, Footnote) now parse
inline markdown via marked.parseInline(). Users can write **bold**,
*italic*, ~~strikethrough~~, and [links](url) directly in structured mode
without switching to freeform mode.

https://claude.ai/code/session_01NFd5wfEQCn6KwD5ZnipfYq
title: Add inline markdown support to structured text fields
